distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
cups-filters was updated to fix two security issues.

These security issues were fixed:
- CVE-2015-3279: Texttopdf integer overflow (incomplete fix for CVE-2015-3258) (bsc#937018).
- CVE-2015-3258: Texttopdf heap-based buffer overflow (bsc#936281).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the WriteProlog function in filter/texttopdf.c in texttopdf in cups-filters before 1.0.70 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a small line size in a print job.
notes.title: CVE description

recommended: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12:cups-filters-1.0.58-8.1.ppc64le

notes.text: Integer overflow in filter/texttopdf.c in texttopdf in cups-filters before 1.0.71 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted line size in a print job, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.
notes.title: CVE description
